item.title: Excellent expression for Paper Writing
item.description: In recently years, high-throughput experimental techniques such as microarray, RNA-Seq and mass spectrometry can detect cellular molecules at systems-level. These kinds of analyses generate huge quantitaties of data, which need to be given a biological interpretation. Cite. for identifying predominant biological themes of a collection of genes. cite Through genomic profiling of 259 men with prostate cancer, scientists have identified five groups of prostate cancer with distinct DNA signatures.
